newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle market thin - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle market thin - USDA.

text.p: Trade was very slow in the Panhandle area Tuesday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers not well tested. Feedlots reporting light inquiry.
Sales reported on 100 slaughter heifers; 13,100 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 12,200 formulated and 300 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Heifers - Pen Select and Choice 2-3 1100 lbs 69.00.
Wk to Date - 13,100 Week Ago - 76,700 Year Ago - 16,900
